title: 0xc00007b Error code
body:
The other day my League crashed mid game and ever since it's been showing me the error 0xc00007b when I tried opening it again. I have tried simply reinstalling it and I have also tried deleting all the d9dx9 files and then running the DXSETUP.exe like so many have suggested on the internet. Still same error coming up. Has anybody got any idea? 

Thanks in advance for your time.

replies.body: Careful!  Wildly deleting or modifying files will likely cause your more issues in the long run!  Something like an OS setting or antivirus is likely blocking game files from being used or read properly, so my suggestion would be to run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if that works for you!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NhfrAZV7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-23T21:00:56.095+0000)
>
> Careful!  Wildly deleting or modifying files will likely cause your more issues in the long run!  Something like an OS setting or antivirus is likely blocking game files from being used or read properly, so my suggestion would be to run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to fix this up.  Let me know if that works for you!

I've tried every last step of it and also downloaded the Hextech Repair tool, which turned out to be useless since it's given me the same error code...

Bummer, but thanks for trying.  In this case grab the logs provided by the HRT and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech guys can work with you individually to figure out what's going on.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NhfrAZV7,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-24T15:29:23.191+0000)
>
> Bummer, but thanks for trying.  In this case grab the logs provided by the HRT and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech guys can work with you individually to figure out what's going on.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

Ummm, I don't have any logs since I can't even start the HRT. Do you mean the logs in the League Of Legends folder?

If the HRT is also getting blocked from launching then I'm pretty certain there is some program or configuration with really high security settings.  The HRT would enable you to automatically process logs, but in this case you may need to manually:

[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
[Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
[Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

It may take a bit more legwork, but grabs those and attach it to your ticket so we can get some more context.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NhfrAZV7,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-24T15:44:45.060+0000)
>
> If the HRT is also getting blocked from launching then I'm pretty certain there is some program or configuration with really high security settings.  The HRT would enable you to automatically process logs, but in this case you may need to manually:
> 
> [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
> [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)
> [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)
> 
> It may take a bit more legwork, but grabs those and attach it to your ticket so we can get some more context.

So I just tried something. I attached USB-Stick and installed the game onto it, it has about 15 GBs so it should be big enough. It's downloading right now, very slowly which could be just my system as it's pretty outdated, the good thing is it hasn't closed and error coded me yet so it might work? Not sure, I'll see and if not I'll submit the ticket. Thanks for all the help still!

EDIT: nvm it just error coded me as I sent the message above lol.

You'll want to run League on your primary internal drive.  Using a USB or external drive will cause installation problems.  Your patch would have to scan for game files every time you launch and only save them temporarily.  Meaning, you'll pretty much be re-downloading League every time you launch it.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=NhfrAZV7,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-24T15:56:54.153+0000)
>
> You'll want to run League on your primary internal drive.  Using a USB or external drive will cause installation problems.  Your patch would have to scan for game files every time you launch and only save them temporarily.  Meaning, you'll pretty much be re-downloading League every time you launch it.

Well it didn't work anyway so yeah I'm trying to get the ticket ready right now.
